review: This is a great product for people who love Amazon. The Amazon TV offers a plethora of television entertainment options like Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime. The product works better when you are an amazon prime member because you can play prime music on the amazon television. The product was sleek and very slim; the product does not take up a lot of space at all. At the end of the day, this product is great for people who do not have cable or who needs a media solution for another bedroom or entertainment room.
